aka: Trener Zoran i njegovi Afrički tigrovi

director.name: 山姆·本斯泰德 Sam Benstead

this_title: Coach Zoran and His African Tigers
trans_title: 教练佐兰和他的非洲之虎
Trener Zoran i njegovi Afrički tigrovi
introduction: Sad story about newborn country of south Sudan and its efforts to catch up with the rest of the world. Story follows football coach Zoran who is trying to achieve certain success with national team consisted of non professional football players. With many outside and inside obstacles he is managing to get them to the African Cup.
chinese_title: 教练佐兰和他的非洲之虎
foreign_title: Coach Zoran and His African Tigers
